thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-United States Steel Corp Reports Q4 EPS $0.90

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-United States Steel Corp Reports Q4 EPS $0.90
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - United States Steel Corp:
* REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.76 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.90 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.62 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.88 * QTRLY NET SALES $3,133 MILLION VERSUS $2,650 MILLION LAST YEAR
* ‍IF MARKET CONDITIONS REMAIN AT THEIR JANUARY 24, 2018 LEVELS, EXPECT 2018 NET EARNINGS OF APPROXIMATELY $685 MILLION​
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.04 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
